storyInfo: The colonel releases Horn, and Horn leads her squad to take the city's communications center. In the warzone, Outcast finds the Dublinns' 'Leader,' now heavily injured and undergoing acute infection, and heads to the injured woman's rescue, steadfast in her beliefs.

attributes.content: Colonel Hamilton, I hope you understand what you've done.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What I've done? I've succeeded in defeating Victoria's enemies, and brought us an all too rare victory.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: You truly think you'll win?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We have eradicated the rabble occupying the city hall and our other important facilities. You can hear it, can't you? Our troops are taking back the city, bit by bit.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Suppose things do go as you intend, the spectre force never recovers from this, and you successfully defend County Hillock—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You will still have brought Victoria a terrible, irreconcilable defeat!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What nonsense are you spouting? I see. You're still soft on those commoners.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Let me say this again, Skamandros. This is war, and victory comes hand in hand with bloodshed.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Enough rationalizing your actions. The locals here have always been part of your plan.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: When you ordered the artillery battalion to make those dirty bombs in secret, the spectre force wasn't anywhere close to infiltrating County Hillock!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Not one to give up easily, are we?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: But fine. All has gone without a hitch, and there's no opportunity left for you to get in the way.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Without a hitch? Because you fanned the flames of war you saw before you?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: War is not an end, but a means.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The wars we fought over the past decades were meant to safeguard Victoria's peace and prosperity. But you? In an afternoon, you laid waste to lifetimes of hard work.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: How dare you blindly attack the common folk in the name of the Victorian Army? Regardless of ancestry, these people are still Victorian citizens!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: They call themselves Tarans!
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: And how much of our country's population is Taran? One-tenth? One-fifth?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Right. You see them in the minority, but when the ire of so many is set alight, it could very well burn down the whole Empire!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hmph. They stand no chance against the might of the Victorian Army.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: They should never have had a need for that chance!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Look at that book you're reading. You marvel at the achievements of the first Aslan king, but did you ever consider what it was that propelled a foreign Aslan to become ruler of Victoria?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If the Aslans hadn't signed an armistice with the Dracos, and if the Draco King Gaeil hadn't yielded to the royal family's decision, the Victoria we know today would never have existed in the first place!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What right do you have—to push Victoria to the brink of civil war once again, all for your own hatred and prejudice?!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Do you really believe everything you've just spouted, Skamandros?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Do you really believe that I, the commander of a single garrison in the countryside, could steer the Empire of Victoria with a wave of my hand?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Have you ever wondered, why... why Londinium is so deafeningly silent?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: I could have killed you. Even being the noble you are, Londinium would never hold me accountable for the death of a lieutenant to rebel cannon fire.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: But I didn't. I respect your loyalty to Victoria, and I cannot bear to see so-called human nature blunt Her blades.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Open your eyes. The war began long ago! And until the last of our enemies lies dead, we will never have true victory!
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Have you ever considered that all you do could be playing right into those enemies' hands?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What you fear is, in fact, my greatest hope—
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: I wish for the fate of the Tarans to be known across all of Victoria!
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: It is not the people I want to destroy. No, I look to destroy their courage.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: I want the whole world to know that, should they dare to turn against us, they must be prepared to withstand the fire of Victoria's rage!
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: How much innocent blood will it take to douse these flames you started today?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Grand dukes with sinister motives, all the surrounding countries with their hidden agendas, and the outsiders teeming with ambition—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: —With all these ill-meaning sides gathered in one spot, Londinium, maybe even all of Victoria, endures far more pressure than one place should bear.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: All those parties, biding their time, need just one little push, and, bang—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The fire will spread, and it won't stop at the Tarans, it will spread all across the once-prosperous lands, sparing no one in its path.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: And how... is that worse than letting the parasites chew you hollow from the inside-out, not doing a thing to stop them?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: It seems there's no going back for you.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: In that case, we have nothing further to discuss.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Perfect, then. I have no need to keep you locked up here. Away with you, if you please.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Once you release me, I will make sure you answer for your crimes.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I swear this on Triangle's team—No matter what happens, as long as I live, I will see you court martialed!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hah. You think that's enough to frighten me?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Listen, Skamandros. If Victoria wishes to lay down judgement, She knows where to find me.
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: And I can't wait to see it done.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Cello, Oboe, we're making for the communications center.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If Bagpipe fails to escort the Messenger out of the city, then that will be our last chance, and we must seize it.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Considering the situation, the communications center has most likely fallen to the enemy. This will be a difficult battle.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But we've never been the type to shy away.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Forward, soldiers of Victoria! We do this for Triangle now, for her team!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: I'm not getting a response—Hill?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: You're not here. How dare you desert your post?
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Where did you go without my specific instruction?!
attributes.name: Colonel Hamilton

attributes.content: Phew... There's way too many wounded here...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: We need to get the ones with light wounds into the buildings that are still standing. Anyone with more serious injuries or symptoms should be taken to the closest clinic—Remember to quarantine them.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: There aren't enough beds in the clinics.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: District Seventeen, the Taran quarter, suffered the worst of the damage in the bombardment.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Some residents cleared out an area to set up a few tents with a few dozen beds, to act as a temporary base.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I've passed on all the prevention methods you've taught me, and a few volunteers are moving the less gravely injured to the tents now.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: As soon as I finish taking care of the first aid supplies we have left here, I'll go join them.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: You're good at this, and they trust you too.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Haha... One of the things I learned in the army over the years is how to make friends.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: They always tell me the guards of honor are the face of the military, and I never doubted it. I've got used to them praising Victoria's glory and prosperity with their applause and cheers.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: That's definitely part of what Victoria means, say what they will.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: But it's not... the whole story.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: After the conversation we had, I remembered some things from ages ago I'd forgotten.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: My da's a lawyer, and he used to tell me stories about how my grandda's grandda came to Victoria with nothing. He went from rags to riches.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: The Victoria he described was an advanced, open-minded, prosperous country.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Here, technology and capital conquered savagery. The people's hard work and wealth wouldn't be destroyed just like that by Catastrophes or racial conflict.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: In making it to such a magnificent land, we Vouivre were able to live a 'civilized' life, compared to one of barbarism and violence in the old country.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Victoria was the most advanced industrialized nation in the world, for a very long time..
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: But we had to give up a lot, in order to become Victorians...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: When I was five, I climbed to the top of the tallest tree in our garden. My da caught me having a blast and gave me a good scolding.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Then he locked me in my room and gave me dozens of books to read. The next day, he hired a Leithanian piano teacher for me.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I missed the view from the top of the tree, but I didn't give it much thought. I knew my da was doing it for my own good.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: He was helping you to get used to the rules.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: That's right. Books, piano, the garden... He understood that those were all things we'd need to know, in order to enjoy the life we had.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: And, I also remembered another thing...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: This one time after school, I saw a few older kids bullying a young Feline girl behind my favorite bakery.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: They laughed at her, saying her clothes were dirty and that she didn't know anything.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: After they left, I went up to her and gave her a few novels I had in my school bag.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I thought she'd be able to talk to the kids her age once she finished reading them, and the others wouldn't pick on her anymore...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: About a week later, I was all excited, went looking for her so we could talk about the books, but she just shook her head and handed them back to me.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I could tell right away. She never even flipped them open. I was really mad. Here I was trying to befriend her, lending her my books, and she wouldn't even accept my kindness.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: It wasn't until much later, I realized...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: She couldn't read.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: She was the child of a bakery worker, not even a baker. How was she supposed to get an education? Forget enjoying any of the same things you did.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: It turns out, even being able to read a novel is a luxury.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Victoria's always been an unequal society, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I wasn't willing to accept that before... I'd let myself grow accustomed to the 'rules,' and that was how I became a proper Victorian. And those who live outside the rules, well, our country would never accept them.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: It takes courage to open your mind on your own like that.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Waking up from a dream of a glorified imagination of a civilization, shaped by a people's collective consciousness isn't easy. Trust me, I know that better than anyone.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Because you're from Laterano?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Because I left Laterano.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: If we get the chance, I'm hoping to hear about your past... instead of having you listen to the silly troubles of an ordinary girl.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: You're not ordinary, Jane. No one should call herself ordinary.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Thanks. All your comfort's keeping me from wasting away, honestly, wallowing in my misery.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: You've never stopped putting in the effort to do your best work.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I've got everything packed. I'll take it over to the temporary medical base now.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Stay alert on the way.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Right. The whole city's in chaos. Thankfully, the garrison's stopped attacking, and the rioters have mostly dispersed. As long as the citizens can band together, there's still hope for County Hillock.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Man is far stronger than we can ever imagine. A lot of ambitious types find themselves on the wrong side of history when they underestimate that.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: *Sigh*. The biggest problem is we don't have enough medicine.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: We can at least clean and bandage their wounds.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I still have medicine with me. I don't need the ones you've shared just yet.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: If I can use some of it, we might be able to save a few more souls.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Put it back. Don't even think about it.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Make sure you're safe before you go saving anyone else. So you can save even more of those who need saving.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Yeah... Okay, I got it.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I'll come back once I'm done delivering this.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: We've taken care of most of the wounded here.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Are you going to head to the other side of the statue?
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Oi, Lass, I'm scoping the area with my binoculars, and I'm seeing an injured girl not far away from where you are.
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: Any details?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: She's young. I can't make out her race... Vouivre, maybe?
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: How is she looking?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Not good. I think I see a huge Originium shard sticking through her abdomen. Chances are she's infected now. Looks like she's lost too much blood and passed out as well.
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: I'm heading there now.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Wait... Lass, that's an active warzone!
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: I don't see any hostiles nearby, but that area was taken over by the rioters not long ago. Besides, the building right behind her is their command center!
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: So?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: That wounded lass is very likely one of their key personnel.
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: Since when has Rhodes Island cared about sides when providing aid to those in need?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Sorry. This isn't a judgement I can make... Oliver, have you been listening in?
attributes.name: Operator Fred

attributes.content: Yes... Lass, I'm not prepared to act rashly either. If she has to do with this whole mess, it might be risky for our company.
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: I get it. You see someone at the center of a power struggle, and who just got infected.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: What I see instead is an Infected who is gonna die in the power struggle afterwards.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: And before she finally dies, a whole bunch of other struggles will swirl around her, sending even more to their deaths.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: But as long as there's still a glimmer of hope that I can stop that ugly mess, I can't give up.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Lass... I can't talk you out of it... but I will follow your lead.
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: No, Oliver, I'm in no position to give you orders, and I certainly don't want to.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: But remember, and make sure you write this in your after action report—
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: This isn't a Rhodes Island elite operator making a call. This is Outcast's personal decision.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Right, and don't forget your 'but.'
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: 'Temporary Operator Outcast did not follow the officer-in-charge's evacuation orders and opted to rescue an individual who constituted a security risk.' Something like that.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Say what you want, even... Forget Rhodes Island. You're putting yourself in serious danger!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: And that is why we can't drag even more people into this mess.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: It's better if Rhodes Island has nothing to do with this operation. You and your operators can follow the original plan. As soon as the rescue operation is done, you get out of County Hillock with all the documents.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Lass... I'll stay with you.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Shredder?!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Oliver, feel free to add another note to the report, that you fired me here on the spot.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: You've got to be out of your mind!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Okay, yeah... Fine. Go. You're saving an Infected, aren't you? That's Rhodes Island's bread and butter!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: I'm not leaving without any one of you. Get to the rendezvous point on time!
attributes.name: Operator Oliver

attributes.content: Thanks, Oliver. You're a great leader.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Shredder, I appreciate the help, but I hope you'll take my advice.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: That is—Stay here.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: I'll go by myself. Whatever happens, do not come after me. Go straight to the rendezvous point.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Right... I'll be there.
attributes.name: Operator Shredder

attributes.content: Outcast...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Jane, you aren't trying to stop me, are you?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Are you really going to save her? I heard she was one of the rioters' central figures...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: She might even be the one who killed Saoirse!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Honestly, I doubt a mysterious group with big plans would leave their true leader to die on the street.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Phew... That's alright, then... I—I feel much better now.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: But what if she was the one who killed her? What would you do? Would you ask me to leave her to die?
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: To tell the truth... I don't know.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: But I agree with what you said. She's a poor Infected girl who desperately needs our help.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: I guess I might ask her once she's out of danger...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Never mind, I'm probably overthinking it. I'll stop wasting your time.
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Off I go then.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: Hold on. One more thing...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Remember what you told me? Make sure you're safe yourself before you help anyone else!
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Well, lookie here. Our little Janie's trying to educate me.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: No... I wouldn't presume to...
attributes.name: Janie

attributes.content: Don't worry.
attributes.name: Outcast

attributes.content: It's just as we said—I'm saving a regular old Infected.
attributes.name: Outcast
